bibl.title: On One of the Origins of Papyrus Paper-making. [En japonais, avec résumé en anglais.]
bibl.note: A bacteria in the Nile Water (the turbidus liquor of Pliny) was the key to ancient Egyptian papyrus making.

bibl.title: Technical Association of Man-Made Fiber Paper

bibl.seg: Osawa S., On One of the Origins of Papyrus Paper-making. [En japonais, avec résumé en anglais.]
Technical Association of Man-Made Fiber Paper 17 (October 1978) pp. 55-57, 1 fig.
A bacteria in the Nile Water (the turbidus liquor of Pliny) was the key to ancient Egyptian papyrus making.
